name: conditional-orders-cli
description: Command line interface for conditional orders

scripts.prepare: npm run artifacts && npm run typechain
scripts.artifacts: mkdir -p artifacts && cp ../out/GPv2Settlement.sol/GPv2Settlement.json artifacts/ && cp ../out/SignMessageLib.sol/SignMessageLib.json artifacts/ && cp ../out/ERC20.sol/ERC20.json artifacts/ && cp ../out/ConditionalOrder.sol/ConditionalOrder.json artifacts/ && cp ../out/CoWSettlement.sol/CoWSettlement.json artifacts/
